<MethodEndpoint

Starts the data deletion for the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"userId":{"type":"string","description":"User ID whose data is reassigned/removed","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Request parameters for terminating the reassignment process","title":"ASC.People.ApiModels.RequestDto.TerminateRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
